message: Let's split it 50/50 to start with, and see how the game goes from here!
You wanted 50/50, I'll give you a bit less than that, but still a good deal for you!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. I'll take 37.5% and leave you with 62.5%.
You're taking more and more, I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm willing to compromise again. I'll take 30% and leave you with 70%. Let's try to find a deal that works for both of us.
